sourcesContent: import React, {ChangeEventHandler, FC, ReactNode, useState} from 'react' import {pipe} from 'fp-ts/function' import { Benefit, BenefitHelperText, BenefitList, BenefitSection, Body, Button, Input, MainHero, MainHeroSecondaryWrapper, MainTitle, MoneySaved, MoneySavedSecondaryText, MoneySavedWrapper, SecondaryTitle, textDark, YearsHero, } from './App.styles' import { annualBenefits, itStaffProductivityBenefits, productivityBenefits, riskMitigation, numberFormat, toCommaSeparated, } from './util' type UseNullableNumber = ( init: number ) => [number, ChangeEventHandler] const useNumber: UseNullableNumber = init => { const [value, setValue] = useState(init) return [ value, event => { const { target: {value}, } = event if (value === '') setValue(0) else setValue(parseInt(value)) }, ] } const App: FC = props => { const [employees, setEmployees] = useNumber(1000) const [years, setYears] = useNumber(3) return ( Knoa ROI Calculator Input the number of employees to calculate the business impact Knoa UEM can have on your organization. If you have{' '} employees, Knoa could save your company {pipe(annualBenefits(1, employees), numberFormat)} In year one or {pipe(annualBenefits(years, employees), numberFormat)} over Years Annual Business Benefits (per {employees} {employees === 1 ? 'employee' : 'employees'}) {[ [ 'Productivity Benefits', In just {years} {years === 1 ? 'year' : 'years'} of using Knoa UEM you will see{' '} $ {pipe( productivityBenefits(years, employees), toCommaSeparated )} {' '} in business productivity gains , ], [ 'It Staff', IT Staff Productivity Benefits and Infrastructure cost reductions will also present some nice savings, around{' '} $ {pipe( itStaffProductivityBenefits(years, employees), toCommaSeparated )} {' '} for your company , ], [ 'Mitigated Risks', Lastly, mitigated risks and employee productivity benefits are expected to generate savings of{' '} ${pipe(riskMitigation(years, employees), toCommaSeparated)} {' '} a year in a company of your size , ], // @ts-ignore ].map(([key, element]: [string, ReactNode]) => ( {element} ))} Metrics based on assumptions from the IDC ROI model Let's get started! Learn how Knoa User Experience Management can significantly improve the utilization and profitability of your enterprise software investment. ) } export default App
